component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: The Graduation approach is a multicomponent livelihood program which provides ultra-poor households with [...] consumption support

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: The Graduation approach is a multicomponent livelihood program which provides ultra-poor households with a productive asset (such as livestock or supplies for petty trade)

study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Researchers are conducting a randomized evaluation to understand the impact of the Graduation approach on ultra-poor households in Upper Egypt

bonus_information.cost_mentions: Study aims to identify variations that could make program more cost-effective
bonus_information.cost_evidence_citation: identify variations that could make the program more cost-effective

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Bab Amal aims to build sustainable livelihoods and resilience among the ultra-poor
evidence_citations.country_citation: among 3,469 ultra-poor households in Upper Egypt
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: The poorest households-known as the "ultra-poor"-often depend on insecure livelihoods and face many barriers to transitioning out of poverty
